full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
**Title:** Supplemental Site Management and Support Services
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01003612
**Publication Date:** August 8, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** September 15, 2022, 14:00 HAE

**Procurement Background:**
Public Services and Procurement Canada (SPAC), on behalf of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC), requires supplemental Site Management and Support Services for temporary accommodations. The current service providers are unable to manage increasing volumes or set up new temporary accommodation sites on an "as and when requested" basis. IRCC seeks a Contractor to provide centralized on-site management of temporary accommodations for asymptomatic unvaccinated asylum claimants, along with accompanying support services.

**Services Required:**

* Centralized on-site management of temporary accommodations
* Surge support for IRCC and its service providers
* Services to augment existing quarantine sites or set up and manage new quarantine sites

**Security Requirements:**
This requirement includes security requirements. For additional information, please consult Part 6 - Security, Financial and Other Requirements, and Part 7 - Resulting Contract Clauses.

**Federal Contractors Program (FCP) for Employment Equity:**
The FCP for employment equity applies to this procurement. Bidders must refer to Part 5 – Certifications and Additional Information, Part 7 - Resulting Contract Clauses, and the annex titled Federal Contractors Program for Employment Equity - Certification.

**Electronic Procurement Solution (SAP Ariba):**
This bid solicitation requires bidders to use the Electronic Procurement Solution (SAP Ariba) to transmit their bid electronically. Bidders must refer to Part 2 entitled Bidder Instructions, and Part 3 entitled Bid Preparation Instructions, of the bid solicitation, for further information.

**Contact Information:**
For inquiries, please contact the GC ADMIN at tpsgc.padaspszl-apspspdzl.pwgsc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Important Dates:**

* Tender Closing Date: September 15, 2022, 14:00 HAE
* Contact the Service Desk agents at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/fr/obtenir-de-laide for technical support with SAP Ariba.
